ing: 2 pineapples, peeled, cored, and cut into 1-inch chunks
des: "Fresh pineapple, banana, and coconut are combined with vanilla yogurt and coconut milk for a unique and delicious fruit salad that will take you back to the beach."
ins: Whisk together the yogurt, coconut, and coconut milk in a large bowl. Stir in the pineapple and banana. Serve cold.
